alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 9:54AM CST until February 21 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Marengo, Hale and Greene Counties. .Flooding continues on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, Pasture and wood lands begin to flood. Livestock should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 90.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM CST Monday was 92.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 80.3 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
